policies.title: School closing
policies.descr: Record closings of schools and universities

policies.title: Stay at home requirements
policies.descr: Record orders to 'shelter-in-place' and otherwise confine to the home

policies.title: Restrictions on internal movement
policies.descr: Record restrictions on internal movement between cities/regions

policies.title: International travel controls
policies.descr: Record restrictions on international travel. Note: this records policy for foreign travellers, not citizens.

policies.title: Income Support
policies.descr: Record if the government is providing direct cash payments to people who lose their jobs or cannot work. Note: only includes payments to firms if explicitly linked to payroll/salaries.

policies.title: Debt and contract relief
policies.descr: Record if the government is freezing financial obligations for households (eg stopping loan repayments, preventing services like water from stopping, or banning evictions)

policies.title: Public information campaigns
policies.descr: Record presence of public info campaigns.

policies.title: Testing policy
policies.descr: Record government policy on who has access to testing.  Note: This records policies about testing for current infection (PCR tests) not testing for immunity (antibody test).

policies.title: Contract tracing
policies.descr: Record government policy on contact tracing after a positive diagnosis.

policies.title: Face coverings
policies.descr: Record policies on the use of facial coverings outside the home.

policies.title: Vaccination policy
policies.descr: Record policies for vaccine delivery for different groups.
